amendment.description: An amendment numbered 22 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to increase and decrease funding for the Bureau of Industry and Security (BIS) by $1,000,000 to encourage transparency in the Section 232 investigation into imports of automobiles and automobile parts by releasing the report to the public.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sewell (AL) amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Ms. Sewell (AL).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sewell (AL) amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
